MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH23 area of Gorebridge. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 10:57am. Our engineers have arrived onsite at the Clearburn Road substation and the team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2pm. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:18pm on Monday, 12 April 2021
